info.title: Move focus backwards into a grid

setupScript.name: setFocusAfterGrid
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link after the grid
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link after the grid
testPageDocument.querySelector('#afterlink').focus();

user: Move keyboard focus onto the first non-header cell in the grid.
instructions.raw: Move keyboard focus onto the first non-header cell in the grid.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: Name 'Transactions January 1 through January 6' is conveyed
Text of the first column header ('Date') is conveyed
Text of the first cell ('01-Jan-16') is conveyed
coordinates of the first cell (column 1, row 2) are conveyed
